Headline: Normal Brown Line Service Being Restored
ShortDescription: Some Brown Line trains are running with residual delays after an earlier bridge lift at the Chicago River, downtown. Service is resuming.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Some Brown Line trains are running with residual delays after earlier bridge lift at the Chicago River, downtown. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are now moving and service is resuming; allow extra travel time.
